title: End of the Pilot (Person of Interest)(1 x 1)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment: That moment when the camera zooms through the surveillance camera and exits into the server farm, accompanied by Ramin Djawadi's excellent score still gives me chills!
I still can't believe this show got canceled and sooooo many trash still survive.
That music at the end is PHENOMENAL

The best series ever 😢 
I hope one day someone will make a beautiful work like this
From 1:45 ... The moment I fell in love with this television show. Not sure why, I just connected with it.
description: The end of the first episode of Person of Interest.
